column5: After doing a fantastic job at the Classic last year, I came across this announcement that Dave is signed on for more in the future:  http://www.bassfan.com/docktalk.asp?id=8287#8287  Going to be another entertaining weigh-in.  Hoipe to catch it on-line.  Congrats Dave!
That is good for Dave. Definitely my favourite fishing pro.
Thanks for posting, Dutch. Fantastic news and great news for all bass enthusiasts. Congrats to you Dave!
boo on that. I want him to work on making new seasons of his show...not MCing american largemouth tournies LOL
Why doesn't he fish it instead?  Or does he do both?
Great news for sure we were very happy to have such a big Canadian name on board and look forward to him this year as well.   Art
